thread.title: O'Keefe Drops "Bombshell" Undercover Video Footage From Within CNN
thread.title_full: O'Keefe Drops "Bombshell" Undercover Video Footage From Within CNN | Zero Hedge

author: Tyler Durden
title: O'Keefe Drops "Bombshell" Undercover Video Footage From Within CNN
text:
O'Keefe Drops "Bombshell" Undercover Video Footage From Within CNN by Tyler Durden Feb 23, 2017 10:04 AM 0 SHARES
As promised two days ago on the Sean Hannity radio show, James O'Keefe and his team at Project Veritas just released secret video footage from within the CNN newsroom. But unlike his usual undercover sting operations, this footage was allegedly sourced from a CNN insider who apparently grew frustrated with the biased reporting of the "fake news" media outlet.
In his radio interview with Hannity earlier this week, O'Keefe promised "hundreds of hours of tape from within the establishment media" and effectively declared war on the mainstream media saying "our next target is in fact, the media."
O'Keefe: In the next 48 hours, Project Veritas, like Wikileaks, will be releasing hundreds of hours of tape from within the establishment media. Our next target is in fact, the media.
Hannity: How long have you been working on this?
O'Keefe: We've had people on the inside come to us. Just like Julian Assange has people come to him, we've had people, sources come to us and give us information, and we're going to be releasing it "Wikileaks Style" this week.
With that brief intro, here is O'Keefe's latest work:
And here is a live feed of O'Keefe reporting on the leaks:
EXPOSING THE MEDIA: Project Veritas Releases Part I CNN Tapes https://t.co/M9MIXiwkdd
